prompts: Generate a playful Electric-type Pokemon with a fluffy tail and bright yellow fur.
Create a bipedal Pokemon that radiates energy and has a unique fluffy mane.
Show me an adorable Pokemon with red accents and a long, lightning-shaped tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that lives in urban areas and has a vibrant yellow body.
Design a friendly Electric-type creature with distinctive features like a white mane.

Make a Pokemon with a cheerful expression and an eye-catching color palette.
